Content: A lot of insider buying on April 1st. Glad to see management has considerable skin in the game. The PE looks incredibly low considering the large revenue numbers

Content: Two equities research analysts have issued 12 month price objectives for FGI Industries' shares. Their forecasts range from $7.00 to $8.50. On average
Author: they anticipate FGI Industries' share price to reach $7.75 in the next year. This suggests a possible upside of 93.3% from the stock's current price. And look what Simply Wall Street says it is worth...$10.19. It trades at a forward P/E of 5...the average for the Trade Distributors industry is 14x. Marketwatch anticipates a nice average EPS increase...from .60 in 2021 to .69 in 2022 and .81 in 2023. That's a 15% EPS increase this year and then a 17% increase on top of that.What's a good PT for FGI? A lot more than the current SP. We closed at $4.86 on 31 January. Touched $6.25 that day. I fully expect us to test and pass that shortly. We should see 7-8 shortly
